question: Recently, Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the country’s longest road tunnel called Chenani-Nashri Tunnel. The tunnel is located in which state of India?
explanation: Recently, Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the longest road tunnel named Chenani-Nashri Tunnel, located in Jammu & Kashmir.  It is the 9-km-long tunnel built at an altitude of 1200 meters, and it passes through the lower Himalayan mountain range on Jammu-Srinagar National Highway 44. It cuts the distance between Jammu and Srinagar to around 250 km from the current 350 km. It is also Asia’s longest bi-directional highway tunnel.
